name: PiPedal
desc: Built and programmed a guitar pedal and it's own online application. Uses neural networks to detect external sound effects and replicate them.

name: CATBooks
desc: Built a book-sharing website where users can post books and add reviews/comments. Calculates ratings, stores user data using MySQL, and features top performing books

name: Mining World
desc: Used lua to create a virtual MMO where players fight monsters and explore alien planets. Generated several thousands of dollars in personal revenue with over 60,000 players world-wide.
